markdown: ###### Minor positive reputation with [Neketaka](/neketaka/);[Humility](/humility/) | rewardname2 = | reward2 = | rewardname3 = | reward3 = | rewardname4 = | reward4 = | rewardname5 = | reward5 = | rewardname6 = | reward6 = | prev = Bounty - Dhwrgas the Ascetic | next = Bounty - Ikorno | internalname = BOUNTY_TSK_Siren | guid = bceb9474-21e0-47f6-bd93-8ba378baee96 }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [bounty](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsBounties/) in {{poe2}}. ## Synopsis A siren has been steering ships into the rocks. Survivor accounts tell of Onadere haunting the western isles of the great [Kua o Rikuhu](/kuaORikuhuIslands/) chain. Killing her will ensure safer passage for ships and earn a hefty bounty. ## Walkthrough * Onadere is located around the western part of the [Kua o Rikuhu Islands](/kuaORikuhuIslands/), at the coordinates 13째 24' S, 52째 12' E. Head there, and wipe her out, watching for the [Earth Blight](/earthBlightDeadfire/)s and [Wraith](/wraithDeadfire/)s that assist her. Then just hand the mission back to [Okauro](/okauro/). * Note that you can kill this bounty without having started the quest, however doing so will not begin the quest. ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/Bounties/BOUNTY_TSK_Siren.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Bounty - Onadere the Siren''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | A siren has been steering ships into the rocks. Survivor accounts tell of Onadere haunting the western isles of the great Kua o Rikuhu chain. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Kill Onadere.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Onadere haunts the western isles of the great Kua o Rikuhu chain. Killing her will ensure safer passage for ships and earn a hefty bounty. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''2''' | colspan="2" | '''Return to Okauro.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | Now that Onadere is slain I can turn in evidence of the kill to Okauro in the Sacred Stair district of Neketaka. |- ! colspan="3" | Unused strings |- | rowspan="1" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''-''' | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 30001 | |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | I killed Onadere and claimed the bounty reward from Okauro. |}

Survivor accounts tell of Onadere haunting the western isles of the great [[Kua o Rikuhu Islands|Kua o Rikuhu]] chain. Killing her will ensure safer passage for ships and earn a hefty bounty. ==Walkthrough== * Onadere is located around the western part of the [[Kua o Rikuhu Islands]], at the coordinates 13째 24' S, 52째 12' E. title: Bounty - Onadere the Siren
